website_summaries.verdict: Fruits, nuts, and seeds combine for a healthy and yummy trail mix.
pros: This is an affordable bag of trail mix with a variety that customers love
Containing walnuts, almonds, and plenty of dried fruit, this is a kosher, gluten-free, and non-GMO mix
cons: This pack is a bit low on salt

customer_reviews.title: Why added sugar???
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE nuts and this trail mix looked really good!! And the bag shows all the right things... "no artificial ingredients", "omega 3", "non GMO", "gluten free", "vegan"... It looked really good and honestly it tastes pretty good. My gripe, and what I didn't notice when I purchased this product is that sugar is added to the cranberries and mango. I don't understand why companies do this... fruit is already sweet. :-( Nice idea and good price but for that reason I won't be reordering. I'll find an all natural alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Lady T

customer_reviews.title: tastes good, but rancid nuts
customer_reviews.text: This mix is quite tasty. However, I would say 10-15% of the almonds in each bag are rancid, and a smaller portion of the walnuts as well. This is disappointing, as this mix is otherwise quite good. I've had rancid almonds in multiple bags now, so this was not isolated to one or two.
customer_reviews.author: r.c.

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: Rocks in trail mix
customer_reviews.text: Trail mix was good, however one of the packs had numerous rocks mixed in the dried cherries. I called and emailed the company, but never heard a response.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn L.

customer_reviews.title: Fruit fruit fruit and more fruit and then some nuts
customer_reviews.text: The fruits were tasty enough but there was way too much fruit for it to be a nut product. Fruits also appear to be Sweetened, not natural.
customer_reviews.author: Nuts and Acorns

customer_reviews.title: It’s good but waaaay too many cranberries!
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy these from my local store ALL the time! I was addicted to the stuff. I’m not sure if the composition has changed or maybe I’m just realizing it now but 70% of the bag is cranberries! I made that number up but it’s ALOT of cranberries and it makes the entire mix sickeningly sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but could use more nuts
customer_reviews.text: This mix is sooooo tasty! I buy two bags of this a month to have a healthy and tasty snack to eat at work. I love all of the ingredients here and they all work well together. I wish there was a higher concentration of nuts in here to give it a little less sugar and make it more filling but I'll usually just add more nuts to the mix on my own.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher N.

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mix. I have tried alot of varieties and this one is my favorite so far. It has all the blends I like, walnuts, almonds, cranberries and more. I like it even more because the dried fruits are tasty and not bland like others. Love it. Will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: MYang

customer_reviews.title: No date on package.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 bags along with 2 protein packed trail mixes. The protein packed has a date stamped on the bottom of 10/09/19 and tasted fresh. The omega packs has no date anywhere on the bags that I could find. They smell oily and nuts tasted old. UPDATE: I reordered and still no date on bags. Good thing though that these bags taste great with so much fresher ingredients. Changed my rating to 4 stars from previous 1.
customer_reviews.author: linrick

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive the amount is small for the price
customer_reviews.text: Price increase since last purchase. I will not purchase again. The quantity is small. This is not worth the price seriously. This item is over priced for amount and what the mixture is. I will buy a trail mix with better ingredients more quantity even if the cost is more.
customer_reviews.author: K.Williams72

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising!
customer_reviews.text: I am not reviewing the product itself which may very well be fresh and delicious and flavorful, but I am writing to alert future buyers of the advertised price. There are 8 packs @ 2.25 oz each for a total of 18 oz, which means the price per ounce is $0.64, not $0.08 as advertised. False advertising!
customer_reviews.author: reryro

customer_reviews.title: About half of this bag is sugared coated fruit.
customer_reviews.text: It's not keto friendly. It's full dried fruit with added sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Jaron Smith

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in melted chocolate
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure this product is quite delicious but when it was delivered to my house today all the chocolate in the package had melted and it looks like quite a mess. I’m not sure if I should send it back or just throw it away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do you like trail mix and feel like you aren't paying enough?
customer_reviews.text: I like trail mix. I love dehydrated bananas. This was just like pretty much every trail mix out there, except it costs more. There are just as many, if not more raisins. The coconut shavings just really get in the way and don't add anything. I honestly feel like you can go to Wal-mart and get something similar for a lot less. It's that convenience tax but also a tax for having all those buzz words added to the title. I don't think there is anything special that sets this apart to deserve the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rob W

customer_reviews.title: 26 grams of sugar in this wee bag! Nearly SEVEN TEASPOONS OF SUGAR!
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding?? Healthy?? The content nutrition data on Amazon is misleading! It's a lie! My purchased bag sugar content in One of these 2.25 ounce bags of trail mix contains nearly SEVEN TEASPOONS of SUGAR! 26 Grams of SUGAR! This company does not show you this on their nutrition image on Amazon. I thought I was purchasing something healthy to eat! This won't keep the weight off if you are seeking an alternative healthy diet. Ugh! See image of true nutrition content! Amazon should not allow companies like this to trick/mislead/falsify consumers into buying their products with lies on their nutrition content.
customer_reviews.author: RjK

customer_reviews.title: Power up trail mix, super healthy & yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a healthy gluten free non gmo snack while on candida cleanse and this is perfect. It us high in omega 3's which help with inflammation and at the same time extremely low in sugar so not feeding candida and it is pretty satisfying as well. I am glad I tried this, perfect blend and the price is right too!
customer_reviews.author: Bgirl

customer_reviews.title: Full of Cheap Filler
customer_reviews.text: I love trail mix because of the variety you get with each handful. This brand is full of repetitive cheap filler pieces. Mostly nasty pecans and dried cranberries. the bag has had a total of about 4 almonds, 3 sunflower seeds (however i think most of these sink to the bottom of the bag so i expect to find more if i choose to continue the path of snacking). The rest has been pecans and cranberries.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT keto-friendly
customer_reviews.text: This item is advertised as Keto-friendly but it is 2/5 dried fruit. You cannot have dried mango or cranberries on Keto. 1 serving of this trail mix has 16g carbs and 12g sugars.
customer_reviews.author: KayandJay

customer_reviews.title: Love the Power Up brand!
customer_reviews.text: I like the Power Up brand of trail mixes. This protein blend is good, but between this one and the Mega Omega, I like the Mega Omega blend better—it has cranberries instead of raisins and a few other differences. I will say that every order of Power Up I’ve received the trail mix has been really fresh. I’m happy about that, as I hate opening a bag of trail mix and tasting that rancid or old or stale mix! Not once has this happened and I’ve eaten, over time, about 6 bags of this stuff! While I prefer the Mega Omega over this one, this was a good trail mix as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Magendie

customer_reviews.title: Great Mix
customer_reviews.text: I saw some other commenters were disappointed with the ratio of fruit to nuts but I think this is a great mix. In fact, I wasn’t expecting as many nuts as I did get- lots of cashews and walnut clusters. If I had to say one thing that didn’t meet my expectations, it would be that the banana chips were not crunchy. Is it strange that the banana chips I usually eat are crunchy? Idk, so I didn’t take a star away for that reason. Still very tasty. I recommend this trail mix.
customer_reviews.author: bcurt2011

customer_reviews.title: Loaded with sugar
customer_reviews.text: Sugar. Sugar. And hey lets have some sugar.. oh and 1 nut
customer_reviews.author: Portland

customer_reviews.title: Really like it.  On my 10th bag.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a snack at work. Nice to have for that mid morning or early afternoon hunger. Gives you a nice punch to get through the day. I have gotten about 10 bags now. I see they are popular as they are often out. The other varieties are good to but this one is the best. My opinion. Well balanced mix not a lot of crap filler.
customer_reviews.author: Stan from Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, and performance enhancing!  The ingredient that took my fitness pursuit to the next level
customer_reviews.text: I am a longtime vegetarian and trying to eat less processed foods and more performance enhancing foods. At just a few months shy of 40, I am really sensitive to dietary mistakes. My performance has gone way up since I snack on this instead of the "performance bars" or other so-called athlete foods. My legs have lost any/all fat or cellulite and I can run longer and faster than I thought I would be able to. By making this switch I am in better shape than I was at 20. I'm very impressed!! The flavor is amazing, perfect crunch. Keeps me from snacking on my son's crackers and bread. Love this brand, keep giving us the good healthy snacks please!!
customer_reviews.author: Stangchic

customer_reviews.title: ❤YUM❤
customer_reviews.text: These taste great and this is a great price for a 14 oz bag. I thought the bag was a little heavier on the fruits (mango and cranberries) than the nuts (walnuts, almonds, pumpkin seeds) but depending on your taste that could be a good thing or not a dealbreaker. They are also low in sodium. Note the nutrition info is for a serving size is 1 ounce (150 cal, 12g carb/10g sugar, 8g fat). I ordered a second bag and I am going to prep in Ziploc snack bags or 1 oz containers because they are so good, it's easy to exceed an ounce.
customer_reviews.author: Andre & Tammie

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang For Your Buck
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with finding trail mixes I really like, that are actually healthy. This one, and 2 others from the same brand, are now my go-to mixes! I like the diversity, and since I usually measure out and eat this for my mid-afternoon lunch, it is great to be able to count on enjoying it. You do have to pay attention to serving size, because it's easy to go wayyyyyyyyy over on calories if you aren't careful! This isn't a paid review, sponsored review, or anything. Just a happy customer who plans on buying more as we run out!
customer_reviews.author: Ka0sNinja117

customer_reviews.title: Recommend the buy.
customer_reviews.text: For $5 this a great amount of product and really good quality too. I like taking a handful on the way the gym or even right after a good work out. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Samaniego

customer_reviews.title: LOVE/HATE COMBO
customer_reviews.text: The ANTIOXIDANT MIX was AWESOME bc there were NO ALMONDS, loved the dark chocolate in the mix with walnuts, raisins, blueberries, pecans & cranberries, nice & fresh! The ALMONDS WERE STALE in ALL the rest of the mixes & didn't like the sugary mango in the MEGA OMEGA but the cranberries were fresh. The PROTEIN PACKED mix was ok except for the STALE ALMONDS, cashews & peanuts-- cherries & raisins good. The ALMOND CRANBERRY CRUNCH had STALE ALMONDS & peanuts--raisins & cranberries were good & fresh. Overall I would just buy the ANTIOXIDANT MIX by itself, wouldn't buy any of the others or in a combo package.
customer_reviews.author: Firewoman

customer_reviews.title: Flavor seems to be different
customer_reviews.text: I know that when you are making trail mixes, or even nut mixes, the flavor can change a bit because of where the fresh products are sourced, or maybe the time of year. I have eaten this exact product several times, mostly local purchases and the first bag I opened on my order has a very different flavor . I am not sure why. It seems fresh but the flavor is not what I a expected. My wife is finishing the first bag so it does not go to waste. i am hoping our second bag is better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not keto friendly
customer_reviews.text: It’s a keto friendly so I ordered it once I got the package and looked at the nutrition label this is definitely not keto friendly
customer_reviews.author: Dominique H

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet..
customer_reviews.text: I soak dry fruits and apple in my over night oats and have it as breakfast every morning. I used Walmart omega 3 trail mix for a long time (which is very much satisfying) and wanted to give power up trail mix a shot for a change. I'm very disappointed with the taste. Its very sweet and spiked my sugar levels which I typically avoid in my first meal of the day. Bananas and coconut with cranberries gave a very sweet taste and I had to dispose my cereal as I couldn't bare the taste. I definitely don't recommend this trail mix for people who wants to avoid too much sugar.
customer_reviews.author: rajitha

customer_reviews.title: Too many craisins
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong I love craisins, but the majority of the bag was nothing but that. It was more sweet fruit than nuts. I would have liked more of an even balance. It may have just been a bag that was off, but it ruined the experience for me. I can't say it didn't taste good though. The fruit was a nice consistency and it was very fresh. I like to sprinkle a small amount of Himalayan sea salt on it and add it to my oatmeal.
customer_reviews.author: UnfinishedSweet

customer_reviews.title: stale
customer_reviews.text: last 2 purchases were horrible. In my Last order one of the bags was more than half empty, this time I receved a stale bag of the mix. dissapointed. wont order again. The quality was good when ordered in past. Don't know what happened.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Adauto

customer_reviews.title: Can confirm: the chocolate is soo good!
customer_reviews.text: I saw a review about how the chocolate is the most delicious part of this mix, and I agree. If you're one of those people that buys a trail mix to pick the chocolate chunks out to eat first, this is the one for you. There's also a ton of cranberries and only a few nuts, so it's basically a dessert mix. Don't go for it if you're trying to be super healthy, but if you want some late night sweets that aren't terrible for you, this is it. I'm going to go back to eating all the chocolate chunks now.. :D
customer_reviews.author: laura starling

customer_reviews.title: Protein packed and Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was very good add on item for my trip in trying to "find myself." Protein is good for the brain to be able to process information and come up with good ideas and Revelations which there was plenty. Thank you for helping mr with good, nutritious superfood. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Craetin

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS ... CAN'T ENJOY ENOUGH ... LOUSY, lousy, LOUSY PACKING!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE NOTE ... It IS a REAL mistake to package a small amount of this food in a VERY LARGE BOX ... because it gives the shipper a chance to pile heavy stuff on top of the box and crush it ... when this package arrived today it looked like a truck might have driven over it more than once ... ONE PACKAGE OF THE CONTENTS WAS BROKEN OPEN, and we decided to throw it away rather than take a chance eating it ... DAMN SHAME when a good product is packaged by people who don't give a s--t about what might happen to it ... BE MORE CAREFUL next time ... DAVE / FT MYERS, FL
customer_reviews.author: David A Brown PhD

customer_reviews.title: Great snack mix
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! I bought a bag of the Mega Omega at TJ Maxx late last year and had issues finding it again (either they sold quickly or didn't get any more). I decided to search for the product on Amazon and is the same as what I paid at TJ Maxx, but is always available! Over the last 3-4 months, I have bought maybe 10 bags of this stuff. I snack while I am work and this is a great filler between meals and the product is always fresh. Will keep buying as long as it is available.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Fresh And Tasty Snack
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good Price; Everything tastes fresh and delicious! Cons: There's plenty of every fruits and nuts, they don't skimp; however, the coconut shavings are tiny and end up mostly at the bottom of the bag, which is disappointing! Also, when you read the label, there's alot of different oils in this product, which isn't exactly healthy, so you have to keep that in mind while indulging.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Too many coconut flakes
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot of ingredients, I felt that my package I received had more coconut flakes than anything else. I ended up throwing it away. The small amount of fruits and nuts tasted great though.
customer_reviews.author: JVG

customer_reviews.title: Good product but price went up for over 100% in two weeks!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these Power Up trail mixes. The Mega Omega has a good blend of dried fruit, seeds and nuts. I like to munch on a handful of this a few hours after dinner if I start getting the munchies. I knocked off two stars because this product has consistently (same variety and size bag) cost $4.98. My most recent purchase was 2 weeks ago (mid-April 2020) and now it is May 1st and it costs $10.60. That's over a 100% increase. I understand we are going thru a pandemic but sellers/companies shouldn't be so greedy and implement such high surge pricing.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Delicious....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased six of the Mega Omega since April 2, 2020. My last purchased was May 22, 2020. (Lol) These are really good, fresh and never stale. I’m addicted to them. The variety of nuts in bag are a even amount. Only 1 of 6 bags was way to many cranberries & most wasn’t chewable because the skin was dry and not the chewy fruit taste. Also it had 5-6 small walnuts in bag. So that bag for me was disappointing. But other then that I love these & will continue buying these because of the freshness & tasty flavors.
customer_reviews.author: CodRos2

customer_reviews.title: STONES!  Be careful
customer_reviews.text: I read a few other people's reviews and thought they were crazy but sure enough a mouth full of this and a painful bite later mine had tiny, tiny I'm talking 1mm stone fragments too. Do not buy this unless you have dentures or don't like potentially damaging your teeth. This is crazy that passed quality control. I tried cutting it with a fingernail clipper just to make sure it wasn't a hard pecan or walnut and it actually dulled/scuffed the edge of the clippers.
customer_reviews.author: AKlop

customer_reviews.title: Not a trail mix fan....
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a huge fan of store bought trail mix so I was skeptical buying this, however, I needed snacks for a hiking trip so I got it. I just ordered my 4th bag and have another coming in my next subscription order. I wish they made larger bags! I was happy to see this didn't contain pepitas or huge chunks of sugary fruit, and love the added coconut and walnuts. I think there's a good ratio of fruit and nuts. The only thing that would make it better is if it had dried cherries.
customer_reviews.author: GeneGenie

customer_reviews.title: A very good snack except for the sugary sweet mango bits
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really enjoyed this trail mix. The almonds and walnuts are crunchy and delicious, and in my opinion much better than peanuts in some mixes. The cranberries and tangy and tasty. Not many pumpkin seeds. The only problem is the mango bits which seem to be drenched in sugar. They could withhold the sugar or just take those out completely to make this healthier and lower sugar content. But for the large size bag, and the reasonable price, very pleased. Mrs K
customer_reviews.author: Donald and Mrs K

customer_reviews.title: A perfect mix for yummy and healthy snacking!
customer_reviews.text: If you watch what you eat and want a healthy snack, this mix will be perfect for you. Once I tried it, I stuck with the brand and only buy their mix from now on. It lasts long as I usually snack on small portions, but it's actually surprising how even a few nuts and dried berried can fill you up and provide you with the so much needed energy. This mix is super yummy and healthy. I'll definitely keep buying it in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy on the dried fruit, but not bad
customer_reviews.text: The nut selection is decent, a bit low on walnuts, not peanuts (good!). Its a bit heavy on the dried fruit, as you can see in the ingredients (nuts are half way down the list). The dried fruit is also decent. So ... I mixed in about 8 oz of mixed premium nuts and the result was excellent. The mixture is not as good as Trader Joe, Whole Foods or Kirkland, but about half the price for 14 oz (my rough estimate). So if you do as I did by adding more nuts, I think its a pretty decent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PorkPie51

customer_reviews.title: Can't stop! These bags of Munchy Heaven are irrestable!
customer_reviews.text: I have become so hooked on the Power Up Mega Omega Trail Mix! Months ago, I searched Amazon for something to munch on that had healthy benefits. I was so intrigued that although the trail mix has nuts (a lot of nuts!), there is no sodium?? I don't understand how that is possible but I sure won't question that, as it affords me the luxury to indulge of enjoying my favorite trail mix more often! In addition, it's rare to find a bag that 'resealable' (at lease in my world) but this bag does what we'd like for bags to do....it recloses over & over again (IF the mix lasts that long:)
customer_reviews.author: cyn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I would have loved this had the walnuts been smaller and there were less raisins. There wasn't an equal balance of the ingredients. I felt like I was eating raisins for the most part. To bad I was looking forward to finding a real go to snack. The brand is just lacking this is the second flavor I ordered the first one was worse. Gave both bags away didn't want to hassle with the whole return process.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy B's Mom

customer_reviews.title: The coconut overpowers everything, can't taste anything else
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this flavor very much (High Energy Trail Mix). The coconut flakes overpower every other ingredient and I can't taste anything else. I tried eating a few pieces of the papaya by themselves and I could still just taste coconut. I also didn't think there were enough banana chips. I won't repurchase this flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda K.

customer_reviews.title: Tasty but not evenly distributed in variety
customer_reviews.text: Love the ingredients but the ratio of cranberries to everything else is TOO HIGH. Also, coconut chips are not edible as I would need a suction tool to even get the small bits into my mouth. Why can't you have larger coconut chips???
customer_reviews.author: Roze

customer_reviews.title: Beware, chipped one of my teeth
customer_reviews.text: I was chewing on a small handful and bit into something small and hard as a rock that chipped a small piece of my tooth off. I’m guessing it was a bit of cherry pit that wasn’t properly removed? Needless to say the bag went into the garbage, be careful eating this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Meatball

customer_reviews.title: OMG! These are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Well, perfect if you want health and without chocolate in a trail mix. I love the packaging, simple yet it shows images for the content. Granted it does show added sugar, but by far better for you to grab for a snack than empty calories and candy. I was torn to write this review in case it flies off the shelf and difficult to order more...I hope not. I ordered the Omega and the Protein. I will definitely order more!
customer_reviews.author: KMach

customer_reviews.title: Not keto friendly
customer_reviews.text: 14 net carbs is not Keto friendly, not sure how it can be stated that way...but it's a good snack for a "free day" .
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Lee Barrio

customer_reviews.title: BEST Trail mix
customer_reviews.text: WOW! is what went through my taste buds the minute I tried this for the first time. The flavor and freshness just pop when you put them in your mouth. Many times I've tried different trail mix's and they come out tasting dry and stale. Which left me hating them for a while until I saw this one and decided to try it. It did not disappoint at all and I am hooked. I definitely recommend this product it's excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Szlyna

customer_reviews.title: Super Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with all the ingredients. I have bought trail mix before that claimed it had cashews and walnuts but when you opened the bag you were hard-pressed to find any. I opened the Power Up Trail Mix and right on TOP I could see walnuts and cashews! I was thrilled. Every piece of fruit in this bag is delicious. I actually threw a handful into my broccoli stir fry last night.....I am very satisfied with this trail mix. I plan on adding this to my carrot and zucchini bread as well. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rancid Walnuts
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the first package of two, the air that came out was rancid. The broken pieces of walnuts are rancid. I am eating all but the walnuts but the walnut content is the reason I bought this particular treat. Apparently rancidity is common as I have seen this in other comments. I have not opened second bag. The good until Sept 2020 indicates the nuts were bad when packaged. I have purchased this for several months. This is second time I have had rancid nuts.
customer_reviews.author: dec

customer_reviews.title: OK as a snack...but VERY Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Product was all right, but was overly sweet for my taste. (You can check the Nutrition Facts on the back of the package to get an idea of the amount of added sugars). One other very minor nitpick... the coconut in the mix was very finely shredded, and got to be quite messy when trying to eat this snack on the go. I think a better option for the manufacturer would have been to use coconut strips.
customer_reviews.author: David Espersen

customer_reviews.title: Smell stale, but they’re not!
customer_reviews.text: I opened the bag and was so disappointed because it smelled like stale nuts. I started picking out the peanuts to throw them away but for some reason I ate one and it was pretty good! I kept the whole mix and it was actually really good if you don’t smell it... weird but true. Great price for the amount of food you get compared to others I found. Not salty at all and very fresh!
customer_reviews.author: shortstop88

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I order Mega-Omega mix in bags of three. I eat some at night before I go to bed as a small snack, mix into oatmeal with dark chocolate chips in the morning and I can even get my twin 7-year-olds to eat it. It is high quality, tastes awesome and NO PEANUTS. I don't want to pay for peanuts which are cheap health mix fillers. I can't say enough about this. The one with the coconut/banana is good, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not KETO Friendly
customer_reviews.text: At 14 grams of carbs, I took it to work and gave it away. I was ripped off. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: Jack Hudler

customer_reviews.title: Too much fruit, to little nuts
customer_reviews.text: I assumed (wrongly) that a nut mix will have 70-80% nuts and some dried fruit for flavor. The dried mango and cranberries comprise more than 50% of the mix (perhaps 60% or more, hard to tell exactly). They are the first 2 ingredients in the list (ingredients are always listed in order of quantity/weight). Also, almonds are roasted (in canola oil). The mix tastes good though if you prefer this much fruit (sugar).
customer_reviews.author: Miron Lior

customer_reviews.title: This is now my favorite trail mix!
customer_reviews.text: I have a blood sugar condition that requires me to keep a steady protein intake throughout the day, so I eat a lot of trail mix. I picked this up at Burlington one day and it was so good, I had to find more. Amazon came through. If you are like me and you hate picking nuts out of your teeth and choking on small nut particles left behind, you will love this trail mix. It has just the right balance of fruit and nuts so that your mouth doesn't get dry from all the nuts. And it tastes great without any added candy! I would recommend this trail mix if you want to give something new a try.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Mazurkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great taste . Convenient, Healthy in moderation, and a good price for the quality of product and nut types. i recommend if you like dried cranberries and the nuts in this mix to try this one. i have a monthly subscription for it and find it well worth it when i need a lift at 10am or 2pm to tied me over until dinner. A handful of this stuff and I'm good to go. Convenient zip so easy to keep in desk at work.
customer_reviews.author: TechieOne

customer_reviews.title: Quite tasty, fresh, and a good price
customer_reviews.text: This gorp is much cheaper than the health food store bins I'd normally purchase it from. With the current health issues in the country I'm rethinking open food bins. I took a chance and ordered 3 of them because the price was so good I was happy to discover that the product was really fresh tasty, not stale old dried fruit and that the bags were good sized. I'd buy these again and recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: dragonflydays

customer_reviews.title: Addicting!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite brand of trail mix. The ingredients are sound, there is very little added sugar (for the exception of dried fruits) and so delicious. I've gotten different flavors from different places, and and I can never stop eating it! Great as a dry snack, but I also stir some into my morning oatmeal for a kind of easy muesli. Can't get enough of it!
customer_reviews.author: LSG

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment good for snacks and camping
customer_reviews.text: Our family does it all. Hike, bike, camp, travel, you name it. I am extremely picky what quality ingredients we consume and I am quite pleased with this trail mix and quality of the ingredients. The price is right, too. The bag is resealable perfect for camping and road trips. If you seek a quality ingredient snack for you and the fam bam give this a try we think you may also approve.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: SUGAR
customer_reviews.text: Do you like sugar??? This is 70% dried cranberries COATED IN SUGAR and dried mangos COATED IN SUGAR and 30% walnuts, almonds & pumpkin seeds ( pumpkin seeds are from China )- For me, this is only good as an added sweetener to my PLAIN greek yogurt. And this is it - THIS IS NOT A HEALTH FOOD- Better than a poptart I suppose but with the added sugar not by much!- I honestly don't think I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t receive my order at all. But I do love this Trail mix with the mixture of nuts and berries. It is delicious. I will be buying more; probably not from Amazon. My first experience shopping from pantry wasn’t a very good experience. My order got lost, ugh.. I have a starving 17 year old boy to feed. Come on now!
customer_reviews.author: NotuRgurl

customer_reviews.title: Not the usual good taste - Best purchased in store versus online
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this product in store and it always taste fresh and is really good. I did not receive the same quality when ordering it here online. The product arrived melted, and was not fresh at all. I ordered two bags and neither had a best by date and tasted bad. I'd definitely recommend this product, but purchase it in store if you can.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hill

customer_reviews.title: A delicious energy booster that far exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved Power Ups High Energy Trail Mix!! It is beyond delicious and delivers the perfect energy boost when you need it the most! I had this in place of breakfast the other day and hoped it would give me the perfect boost of energy (and such) that I needed. All I had was about a quarter cup on the go and it gave me enough energy to function and then some! I will definitely be buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: Kellytriesall

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH YUM!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a huge fan of trail mix. My sister got the first bag as part of the graduation gift. She said it was amazing and I tried some and HOLY WOW! It was delicious. The best trail mix I have ever eaten. We finished that bag the first day and then ordered several more bags. I ordered a variety pack to try the flavors and this is by far the best one. It is like a mouthful of Hawaii. Yum!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: No lack of cherries and raisins
customer_reviews.text: Great trail mix! I've tried a bunch and I was looking for something with cherries in it. There's no lack of cherries and raisins in here which in my opinion breaks up the dry monotony of the nuts and such. I even bought a 4lb bag of dried cherries to add because I'm a cherrophile. I'll definitely continue to get this mix and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: TJ Taraszka

customer_reviews.title: This is candy....really good and relatively healthy candy.. but it's still candy
customer_reviews.text: "sugary sweets.....aren't the answer" written directly on the packaging, 3 inches away from the ingredient list describing the fruit as being super-saturated with sugar. This product is very good for what it is. The problem is that it is being dishonestly marketed as a health food, when it is actually candy.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fan of this, on my third order.
customer_reviews.text: This became one of my favorite trail mix items. Everyone has a different metabolism, but for me, the nuts are perfect- walnut, pepita, almond. Also cranberry and mango agree with me. My only criticism is a bit too many cranberries, could use more nuts. In my case, this mixture seems to help me maintain a healthy weight. It tastes fresh also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TOO MUCH SWEET STUFF, NOT ENOUGH NUTS
customer_reviews.text: Even some of fruit products were soaked in sugar, making them like candy. For trail mix I want something nourishing, not a sugar high.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E.

customer_reviews.title: FIVE STARS OVERFLOW YUM! POWER UP AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!! So Fresh!!! So Good!!! Great Quality!!! Now allow me to slow down a moment, while I enjoy the individual taste of this marvelous blend of heart healthy Trails ahead! Keep the Faith and Keep your hands washed etc! Moreover, it’s a good gift to You, best price, and size as well. Make somebody else’s day, and give this yummy fresh treat, as a gift to someone who could use their spirits lifting up! Just leave some for me. I will be back!
customer_reviews.author: Jacque19

customer_reviews.title: Fantastically Addicting
customer_reviews.text: You cannot eat JUST ONE; it is addicting, to say the least. Just TOO DANG GOOD 😂.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after a recommendation from Jen at The Sister Studio and these did not disappoint! Didn’t necessarily give me more energy, but was a healthy snack and a much better alternative than what I had been eating. Kids like it too. The dried fruit are a little sweet for my taste, but that just means I don’t eat as much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great and Extremely Fresh
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely some of tbe freshest and best tasting trail mix I've purchased. Its w as y better than the more expensive brands I buy in stores. I wasn't sure how it would be since its online and the price is lower but I'm so glsd I tried it. Im buying more asap and wherever I get back to the office This will be in my work snack stash.
customer_reviews.author: DymondDiva

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Trail Mix
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a couple more packages of this delicious Trail Mix recently. The ingredients are fresh and tasty with no artificial "anything" and the price is right. A good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: iacevedo

customer_reviews.title: Sourced from china
customer_reviews.text: Made in China so questionable quality Too much sugar Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Healthy doesn't have to be boring!
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time buying this brand, and the decision was really based on price. You're getting a lot for under $5. Both the quality and quantity didn't disappoint, and the Mega Omega trail mix nails the sweet spot between fruity and salty. I was pleasantly surprised and will definitely keep this on my subscription!
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Arrived rancid
customer_reviews.text: These are interesting-ish blends, but the nuts are all rancid enough to be...extremely unpleasant. I bought directly from Amazon (ie, Amazon was the seller), and did receive a full refund without having to return them. Now the problem is, I hate to throw away food, but I sure don't want to eat them!
customer_reviews.author: Julia James

customer_reviews.title: pricey but decent quality
customer_reviews.text: my biggest issue with this product is the price per proportion. there is way to many cranberries compared to the nuts, and the cheaper nuts compared to the better ones. $7 is high for this, even though that is what everyone charges pretty much, and greedy capitalism is killing this country.
customer_reviews.author: kevin k.

customer_reviews.title: It is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This is my FAVORITE by far! It’s delicious and full of flavors that compliment one another. It is always fresh, but I can’t tell you how long it stays fresh because it gets eaten so quickly! This is something I order about every two weeks. High recommend you try this. My only complaint is that it needs to come in a bigger bag 😌!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this snack. I love this trail mix. It was completely fresh when I received it, and delicious. I ordered the Protein Packed variety. This is a great vegan snack. In terms of price, it's also one of the best deals on Amazon for the amount and product quality. I believe it's fourteen ounces. In my opinion, the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: April Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very, very good and healthy !
customer_reviews.text: I will buy more of the PUTM ! Very surprised at how wholesome and delicious it is. I am a Blue Collar worker in a very large facility and keeping a bag with me throughout the day is awesome. Seriously, this is a really good mix of goodness and health. David
customer_reviews.author: David Carruthers

customer_reviews.title: Freshest Trail Mix Ever
customer_reviews.text: I am going to recommend this nut mix to all my friends and relatives. I have tried all the brands from everywhere - I thought. This is the freshest mix without added ingredients...walnuts whole, without blemish....yum. Everything so much better than one can buy at Trader Joe's, Walmart, Target , Aldi or drug store chains, etc. This is the very best!
customer_reviews.author: K. Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Fresh, high quality, not expensive
customer_reviews.text: This edition of Power Up Trail Mix is one of the best trail mix in the market in terms of price, freshness and taste. Price is unbeatable. It might be on promotion considering other versions are remarkably expensive than this one (of course, ingredients are different). Most importantly, it is full of freshness. Especially, walnuts and almonds are crunchy -- which is the most apparent measurement of freshness. It is also delicious due to a perfect combination of nuts and fruits. I put this on monthly subscription and will try other versions.
customer_reviews.author: Astro

customer_reviews.title: Almonds stale
customer_reviews.text: The first order of this Trail Mix was so fresh and good we ordered several more bags. Unfortunately the almonds in the first bag from this order were stale. We separated them from the rest of the contents and enjoyed the rest of the bag. Hopefully the next bags will be fresh.
customer_reviews.author: PAC

customer_reviews.title: Where are the nuts?
customer_reviews.text: I bought three varieties from this manufacturer and have found all three very heavy in dried fruit with added sugar and very lacking in nuts. So much so that I went out the day after getting these to get bags of walnuts and pecans to add to them. Good flavor, but likely won't buy again if I have to buy additional ingredients. Can make my own at home.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: Fresh!!! This is great, I really didn’t expect a big bag for less than $5.. this bag is huge and is stacked with walnuts and cashews and all that other stuff. Bargain to the the least! Gonna stock up on their other mixes. Really good stuff
customer_reviews.author: c.710

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Blend of Fruits & Nuts
customer_reviews.text: Having MS, most of my energy dissipates by 10am. I am glad I saw this. It's the perfect combination of fruits and nuts that go so great together that husbands won't suspect that it's good for your health. An energy packed snack to get you through the 3pm slump at work. It also takes the hunger pains away until dinnertime. Plus, it won't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly C.

customer_reviews.title: Too much fruit, but very fresh.
customer_reviews.text: I like more nuts, but maybe others don't. Thought there are too many fruits and have given them to the birds! My little buddies outdoors. They love the fruits so they didn't go to waste. I don't think I would order the product again though. But for those who love fruits, go for it!
customer_reviews.author: ZuzuLily

customer_reviews.title: Not tasty
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients are good but not so fresh or tasty in my opinion . They were soft and not crunchy. It is important to realize the nuts are not crunchy or not seemed roasted with salt, and they look pale. Taste more sweet to me because the amount of raisins is generous and because the cherries tasted great. The quality is really good for the price, my aunt recommended this trail mix and I suppose is good if you are in a low sodium diet, but you can eat sweets.
customer_reviews.author: yitaherrera

customer_reviews.title: This is a great line of nutritious natural nuts and Dried fruits.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy The “power up” line of dried fruit and nut blends. The antioxidant blend has dark chocolate included in the mix which gives it a really nice balance. I tried to eat this line of natural dried fruits and nuts to satisfy my sweet tooth. It’s doing a really great job in keeping my cravings under control!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael D./lovinAMAZON

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Tail Mix
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite breakfasts is this trail mix mixed with yogurt. The ingredients are fresh, the dried fruit is moist and easy to chew and the occasional walnut is a treat within a treat. This trail mix is as wholesome an organic apple picked fresh off the tree. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: L.W. Samuelson

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite Snack!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never been a big fan of trail mix, but was browsing on Amazon for some inexpensive items to stock up on for quarantine during the coronavirus pandemic. I was surprised how much I enjoy this mix, it’s SO yummy! I’m reluctant to add to the great reviews in fear of the price going up and quantities being limited, but shoot, I have to tell someone how great it is! 😅
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great and good QC
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this flavor for a while now. Each bag has a consistent mix of types and nice sized chunks. I appreciate this since some brands have little crumbs or too much of the cheap ingredient. The variety gives a good sensation of having a different flavor with each bite.
customer_reviews.author: Bongo

customer_reviews.title: I've gone nuts over these nuts
customer_reviews.text: The nuts came fresh and of high quality and I'm in the island of Jamaica. I mixed them with my Almonds and Pumpkin seeds ...Now I can snack healthy at home or work ...I remove the nuts and blend them dry with Ensure powder, Oats, Sesame seeds and dry soy milk ..make a powdery substance which I take to work and add hot water to..This makes me s healthy nutritious fulfilling punch for lunch .💪👍
customer_reviews.author: johnnybighood

customer_reviews.title: Best trail mix without junk in it
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a Whole 30 trail mix that didn't have any extras like M&Ms in it. After trying one bag, I ordered 4 more. This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.author: J Boardman

customer_reviews.title: Staled and moldy trail mix
customer_reviews.text: I have a monthly subscription on this product. I love this tail Mix. However lately the product appears stale and moldy. I had to request replacement twice for the delivery. Is this because the product is not properly stored during the summer time? How long have these deliveries stored in the warehouse?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Power Up Trail Mix, Almond Cranberry Crunch Trail Mix, Non-GMO, Vegan, Gluten Free, No Artificial Ingredients, Gourmet Nut, 14 oz Bag
product_meta.description: Size:14 Ounce (Pack of 1)| Style:Almond Cranberry CrunchPower Up Trail Mix, Almond Cranberry Crunch Trail Mix, Non-GMO, Vegan, Gluten Free, No Artificial Ingredients, Gourmet Nut, 14 Ounce Bag
feature_bullets: Our Almond Cranberry Crunch trail mix is a delicious blend of nuts, fruits and seeds. Almonds and peanuts provide you with proteins and Omega-3 “heart-healthy” fatty acids, while raisins and cranberries offer a great source of antioxidants. All of this combines together to offer the perfect, healthy snack!
Project Verified Non-GMO, No Artificial Ingredients, Gluten Free, Vegan, Certified Kosher

Made from only the best, most premium whole nuts, dried fruit and seeds, our delicious trail mix does not contain sulfites, or other preservatives. Our Almond Cranberry Crunch Trail Mix is a unique and satisfying blend of crunchy peanuts, crispy almonds, sweet cranberries, and nutritious raisins.
Our Almond Cranberry Crunch trail mix is perfect for on-the-go snacking. You can also top our delicious trail mix on your salad, oatmeal, or yogurt. Make POWER UP a part of your next adventure!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
